email_content:
Hi Sven,

I hope you've been doing well!

I wanted to stay in touch and reconnect after our last conversation about Exofex B.V. and your need for administrative and data entry support in your logistics operations. It was great learning how your team manages document processing and system input, and how accuracy and reliability are key to your workflows.

From our side, Remote Helpers can support you with:
üìã Administrative and data entry specialists ‚Äî experienced in processing logistics documents, verifying data, and updating internal systems.
üíª Customer support or coordination assistants ‚Äî to help manage communication with partners and maintain records.
‚öôÔ∏è Flexible collaboration options ‚Äî from part-time to full-time, with a simple onboarding process and a 3-day trial to ensure the right fit.

If you're still exploring options, I'd be happy to share a few candidate profiles that match your needs and schedule a short follow-up call to discuss next steps.

üìÖ Would next Thursday or Friday at 2:00 - 3:00 PM your time work for you?

Looking forward to your feedback,
